embeds.title: Why some data is wrong?
embeds.description: The Facts have been added using a technique called "data wrapping" (extracting information from a website using a bot) from the official [Islands Wiki](https://robloxislands.fandom.com) website. As a result, various problems may occur:

embeds.title: 1. Bad synchronization of links:
embeds.description:
Sometimes hidden links (also known as masked links) may be out of sync on the page. This can be easily detected by reading the original Trivia and added Fact in the database. You can read the facts in [Github](https://github.com/Stageddat/kor/blob/main/src/facts/facts_list.md) better visualization.
**Note that this type of error is the least common.**

embeds.title: 2. Incorrect styles
embeds.description:
Some styles in the trivia may be incorrect such as italic or bold. This can be detected because some words are together.
**Note that this type of error is the most common.**

embeds.title: 3. Incorrect space tabulation
embeds.description:
This occurs because some Trivia have other sub-Trivia.
**This is one of the most common errors that can be found.**

embeds.title: 4. Error in spaces
embeds.description:
Sometimes the code extracted from the page may be incorrect and may be too close together or too far apart between words.
**Note that this type of error is the least common.**

embeds.title: 5. Reference error
embeds.description:
This error happens because the trivia is referring to an obvious thing on the page but you can't tell without the context in the fact.
**Note that this type of error is the most common.**

Example:
-- No context
```Game loading tips refer to them as "source flowers".```
-- Providing context
```The in-game loading tips refer to fertile flowers as "source flowers".```

embeds.title: 5. Common sense
embeds.description:
Some Trivia can be really short or too long. Using common sense, it is best to remove these Trivia from the database. It is also advisable to delete the boring, too common Trivia or those that are already well known.
**Note that this type of error is the most common.**

Example:
-- Too common
```You can water the plants.```

embeds.title: 6. Other errors
embeds.description: This is still in beta phase, because of this, many errors may occur. The bot is prepared for these errors and automatically warns the administrators but cannot warn for spelling errors, timing errors etc.

embeds.title: 6. Other errors
embeds.description: This is still in beta phase, because of this, many errors may occur. The bot is prepared for these errors and automatically warns the administrators but cannot warn for spelling errors, timing errors etc.

embeds.title: How to report errors:
embeds.description: To report any problems you have had with one of the above situations, contact <@756509638169460837> or any administrator to try to fix it.
